segments.text: How are you doing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm doing great .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What movies have you seen lately ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I saw Forrest Gump the other day .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What type of movie is that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The movie type is drama .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can't believe you are watching movies . The weather is great . You should be outside .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I hate the hot weather . I'd rather stay indoors with the air conditioner .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What else do you like to do besides watching movies ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like to play computer games , read books , go shopping , and play pool .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Out of those what is your favorite ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My favorite is to play computer games .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What is your favorite computer game ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My favorite is Diablo . It used to be Star Craft , but it is getting a little old .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you like to play so much , when do you ever exercise ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Although I hate to exercise , I go jogging at least twice a week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's pretty good . By the way , what are you doing next Saturday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am going to go to the bookstore .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am having a party Saturday night at my house . If you have time , you should come .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds like fun .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great . I'll see you on Saturday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok . See you later .
segments.speaker: S2
